text:
@CNN Dear Sen Cornyn and Cruz,
your President is an idiot
paraphrasing Chris Rock:
Trump doesn't give a F#&k... if he had a pocket of F#&ks and you were dying of Covid-19 just beside him and all you needed is a F#&k to heal immediately... Trump will say sorry, I don't give a F#&k""
